REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0930 reute s f BC-MCRAE-INDUSTRIES-<MRI 03-24 0048

TEXT.TITLE: MCRAE INDUSTRIES <MRI-A> INCREASES PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: McCrae Industries Inc said it raised its preferred dividend on its Class A common stock to 12 cts per share from 11 cts per share. It said the dividend was payable April 20, 1987, to shareholders of record April 6. Reuter
